Package dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.statement

Class Batcher<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.statement.Batcher<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - batch key type
    V - batch value type

    public class Batcher<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains ordered batches of values with common keys.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new batcher for a list of keys.

      Invokes a given action on each value in each batch, and a finalizer at the end of each batch.

      • Batcher

        public Batcher​(java.util.List<K> keys)
        Constructs a new batcher for a list of keys.

    • Method Detail

      • batch

        public Batcher batch​(java.util.Map<K,V> batch)
        Adds a batch to this batcher.
        Parameters:
        batch - {key, value} pairs to add as a batch to this batcher
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any key in batch is not in the list of keys set in this batcher

      • forEach

        public void forEach​(dev.kkorolyov.simplefuncs.function.ThrowingBiConsumer<java.lang.Integer,V,?> action,
                    dev.kkorolyov.simplefuncs.function.ThrowingConsumer<java.lang.Integer,?> finalizer)
        Invokes a given action on each value in each batch, and a finalizer at the end of each batch.
        Parameters:
        action - action invoked with (index, value) of each value in each batch
        finalizer - action invoked after end of each batch, invoked with index of the last batch
